sect1.title: FindTZData

row.entry: REQUIRED. The time zone abbreviation to search for; must be a non-empty uppercase string.
OPTIONAL. The name of the location to search for; if a location is not provided or is an empty string, all records matching only the abbreviation are returned.

sect1.para: The STD.Date.TimeZone.TZDataForLocation function returns the time zone records for a given abbreviation and optional location. A location should be provided as a method of differentiation if the abbreviation has duplicate entries.
